decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively control the board with a combination of disruptive creatures and removal spells. By utilizing cards like Preacher of the Schism and Deep-Cavern Bat to apply pressure, while also running efficient removal like Go for the Throat, the deck aims to maintain a fast tempo and keep the opponent on the back foot. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor adds a strong finisher to the deck, allowing for a versatile and deadly aggressive strategy.

The main concept of this Dimir Aggro deck is to have a fast-paced aggressive strategy with a mix of controlling elements. Using creatures like Faerie Mastermind and Spyglass Siren, along with removal spells like Go for the Throat and Cut Down, the deck aims to apply early pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Preacher of the Schism and Gix, Yawgmoth Praetor adds additional synergies and versatility to the aggressive game plan. Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Tishana's Tidebinder provide late-game power and resilience to help secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to establish control over the game using white cards that manipulate the board state and provide defensive options. It utilizes cards like Lay Down Arms and Get Lost to disrupt opponent's plans, while also deploying creatures like Archangel Elspeth and Fountainport to establish a strong defensive line. The deck also includes cards like Caretaker's Talent and Novice Inspector for card advantage and resource management. Overall, the deck aims to outlast the opponent while slowly building up its own board presence to secure victory.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with aggressive creatures like Deep-Cavern Bat and Preacher of the Schism, while disrupting the opponent's game plan with removal spells like Go for the Throat. The deck also includes cards like Zoraline, Cosmos Caller and Liliana of the Veil to generate card advantage and control the battlefield. With a mix of aggression and disruption, this deck aims to outpace the opponent and maintain pressure throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to establish control over the game by using a combination of mana acceleration, creature removal, and card advantage. The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly with cards like Herd Migration and Fabled Passage, while using Leyline Binding and Archangel of Wrath to control the board. Atraxa, Grand Unifier and Jace, the Perfected Mind provide additional card advantage and control options, while Temporary Lockdown and Get Lost offer disruption for the opponent's strategies. Overall, the goal is to outlast the opponent and grind out a victory through superior control.

The main strategy of the deck is to control the game through removal spells, countermagic, and powerful planeswalkers like Ral, Crackling Wit and Archangel Elspeth. The deck also includes cards that provide card advantage such as Caretaker's Talent and Meticulous Archive. With a mix of burn spells like Lightning Helix and board wipes like Destroy Evil and Torch the Tower, the deck aims to keep the opponent's board clear while building up its own resources. The mana base is designed to provide a good balance of colors to support the control game plan effectively.
